result.html: Bainfidh mé do dhíoltas amachI will revenge you.
result.ponchtml: Bainfiḋ mé do ḋíoltas amaċI will revenge you.

result.eng: He threatened the king with revenge.
result.ga: Bhagair sé díoltas ar an rí
result.orig: Bhagair sé díoltas ar an rí
result.html: Bhagair sé díoltas ar an ríHe threatened the king with revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ḃagair sé díoltas ar an ríHe threatened the king with revenge.

result.eng: They would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.
result.ga: Bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálach
result.orig: Bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálach
result.html: Bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálachThey would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.
result.ponchtml: Ḃainidís díoltas amaċ ar úinéirí talún a ḃí cruálaċThey would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.

result.eng: He was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.
result.ga: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a athar
result.orig: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a athar
result.html: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a atharHe was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé réiḋ le díoltas a ḃaint amaċ as bás a aṫarHe was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amach
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amach
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amachHe would do anything to take revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé rud ar biṫ ċun díoltas a ḃaint amaċHe would do anything to take revenge.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé aon rud ċun díoltas a ḃaint as toisc gur ṁaraiġ sé a aṫairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.

result.eng: All they wanted was to take revenge.
result.ga: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amach
result.orig: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amach
result.html: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amachAll they wanted was to take revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ ar a intinn aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċAll they wanted was to take revenge.

result.eng: All they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ga: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.orig: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.html: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ponchtml: Níl uaṫu aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċ ar a gcuid sean-naiṁdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.

result.eng: The Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.
result.ga: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na Fraince
result.orig: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na Fraince
result.html: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na FrainceThe Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.
result.ponchtml: Rinne na Naitsiṫe ár uafásaċ ar ḟir an ḃaile mar ḋíoltas ar ġníoṁarṫa Ḟriṫḃeartaíoċt na FrainceThe Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.

result.eng: Clearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.html: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ Stáit Aontaiṫe Ṁeiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollṁóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
